chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 13 mini has the above problem: I want to cancel this order. I can see that the order has still not been placed. Can you please cancel it? Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The order has been successfully cancelled and the customer has been refunded.

Regards,
JY
